1. You need a wii with a chip installed. Wiikey, ect.
2. Download the game, and seed it.
3. Unpack the .rar files with winrar.
4. Burn the iso file with imgburn,cloncd ect. on a dvd-r.
5. Have fun!!

A wiikey or a D2Ckey or even a argon chip are mod chips that you have to take your wii to bits then solder the chip in, if your wii was brought in the last 3 months then you cant fit a wiikey you have to go with one of the other chips coz nintendo have changed to pcb so wiikeys cant be fitted.
But I would strongly say to you dont try to install it yourself...pay for a pro to fit it, It's very easy to kill your wii...like I did!! 
good luck

Exceed_download_limit 

You need to check the file and see how many KB large it is.

It should be,
4.37 GB (4,699,979,776 bytes).
Any smaller than this means that person who did the rawdump iso.file copy of the game disk did not get all the game disc and you might get problems playing or load the game?
Hope this helps
